msItem.title: Zubdat al-Tawarikh. (or Majma' al-Tawarikh or Tarikh-i Haidari)
msItem.note: The manuscript lacks a preface. Above the text on f1b a note in blue pencil identifies it as the Mir'at al-Adwar of of Muslih al-din Lari, incorrectly. Over this is another in black ink identifying it as the Zubdat al-Tawarikh of Haidar(-i) 'Ali Husaini Razi which appears to be correct. F1a. Signature of Ellis, and date 25.3.02 Inserted loose near the beginning is a table of contents in the hand of Ellis. The first volume of a large general history, beginning with the creation and ending with Mamliks of Egypt. Headings in red.

listBibl.bibl: Rieu, Suppt. pp. 20-22. Cf. I, pp. 887-8.

bindingDesc.p: Red leather Indian binding, perhaps in European technique, with silver tooling.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
